projects.title: Construction Documents
projects.description: We design and build homes to survive in some of the most challenging environments like high humidity and coastal oceanfront exposures.

projects.title: Bidding & Negotiations
projects.description: There are a number of ways of selecting your Contractor and negotiating the construction cost for your Project, and we are able to assist you with your preferred method.

projects.title: Construction Administration
projects.description: During the construction of the home, we act as your representative by observing the progress of construction for conformance with our drawings and specifications.

projects.title: Contractor Selection
projects.description: Professional and experienced assistance with the selection of qualified General Contractors or Construction Managers.
